name: @deepstream/protobuf
description: The protobuf protocol wrapper used by deepstream.io

scripts.generate: rm -rf generated && mkdir generated && pbjs -t static-module --no-verify --no-create --no-convert -w commonjs -o generated/protobuf.js proto/*.proto
scripts.tsc: npm run generate && rm -rf dist && tsc && cp -rf generated ./dist/generated

author: deepstreamHub GmbH
